::Zardus::

"Yes, you can, Najah," Zardus replies to the snake as he changes destination and walks toward the exit of the Iron Fist. He recieves the Daemos's message as he exits the ship, seeing Daemos emerge and introduce himself. He approaches, looking the bot over.

"Very impressive," he says, walking past Supernova and his team. "I am Zardus. Welcome to my base."

He stops a few feet from Daemos, waiting for the reply, his mind already calculating what he could use this mercenary for.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Daemos received the welcome message from Zardus.
> 
> Daemos:
> Thank you, Zardus. And thank you too, Supernova. I must tell you, though, 
> that I will show myself in my beast mode.
> Hellgate, open lock.
> 
> The Hellgate's doorlock opened and Daemos walked out. His body was that of a 
> middle-sized red demon, but there was something else...
> His spikes, running all over his back to his cranium, were metallic, and his 
> legs were covered with circuitry. The claws of his hands were 
> disproportionned, seeming to be a lot larger than his body could support.
> 
> Daemos:
> I am Daemos, first Tripredacus to be reformatted as a techno-organic 
> transformer.
